cslediagnostic.display.name: Chinese Expression Diagnostic
cslediagnostic.checkGlyph.desc: Select the Chinese glyph you want to check
cslediagnostic.convertGlyph.desc: Select the Chinese glyph you want to convert (not the same as check glyphs)
cslediagnostic.excludeFunctions.desc: Exclude function names or method chains from checking (such as print, logger.debug, etc.)
cslediagnostic.traditional.tw.desc: Check for Traditional Chinese (as used in Taiwan)
cslediagnostic.traditional.hk.desc: Check for Traditional Chinese (as used in Hong Kong)
